data.title: The Original Superstars of 70s Soul 6-DVD/6-CD Set
data.meta_description: SUPERSTARS OF SEVENTIES SOUL is a once-in-a-lifetime gathering of legends — all original performers singing their greatest rhythm and blues hits. Aretha Franklin, Lou Rawls, Patti LaBelle, Jerry Butler, Dionne Warwick and other icons host these historic reunions of classic recording artists in concert.Highlights includ
data.text:
SUPERSTARS OF SEVENTIES SOUL is a once-in-a-lifetime gathering of legends — all original performers singing their greatest rhythm and blues hits. Aretha Franklin, Lou Rawls, Patti LaBelle, Jerry Butler, Dionne Warwick and other icons host these historic reunions of classic recording artists in concert.

Highlights include the Commodores ("Brick House"), Gloria Gaynor ("I Will Survive"), original lead Eugene Record reuniting with the Chi-Lites ("Oh Girl"), The Spinners ("Could It Be I'm Falling In Love"), Thelma Houston ("Don't Leave Me This Way"), The Stylistics ("You Make Me Feel Brand New"), Yvonne Elliman ("If I Can't Have You"), Debbie & Joni Sledge of Sister Sledge ("We Are Family") Earl Young’s Trammps ("Disco Inferno"), Billy Paul ("Me & Mrs. Jones"), Anita Ward ("Ring My Bell"), the Emotions ("The Best of My Love"), Peaches & Herb ("Reunited"), Harold Melvin's Blue Notes ("If You Don't Know Me By Now"), Carl Carlton ("Everlasting Love"), the Manhattans ("Shining Star") plus dozens more timeless dancefloor favorites and romantic smooth grooves.

SUPERSTARS OF '70s SOUL CD SET is the most comprehensive collection ever of the biggest hits and artists from the decade that brought The Spinners, Barry White, Gloria Gaynor, The Stylistics, Teddy Pendergrass, Kool & The Gang, Marvin Gaye, The Pointer Sisters, The O'Jays and dozens of other legends to the top of the charts.

This special CD set is not available in stores and features over 100 soulful smashes

including Theme From Shaft, Everlasting Love, If You Don't Know Me By Now, Ain't No Woman (Like The One I've Got), Let's Get It On, Never Can Say Goodbye, Disco Inferno, One In A Million You, Ain't No Stoppin' Us Now, Midnight Train To Georgia, Love Train, Slow Hand, Kiss And Say Goodbye, Rock The Boat, After The Love Has Gone, Lean On Me, Turn The Beat Around, When Will I See You Again and much more. All the dance floor favorites and romantic rhythm and blues ballads are here!
